text: Gei mee gaa hai dana hagailoo gi nia daangada huogodoo Israel, e hai boloo, “Maa goodou ma ga hiihai, gei deelaa di hiihai o Dimaadua go tadau God, gidaadou e hagau tadau gau kae hegau gi tadau daangada, mo gi digau hai mee dabu, mo digau Levi i lodo nadau waahale, gi haga iloo bolo gi dagabuli mai gi kinei gi tadau baahi.
